## AddDirectoryOption interface

Add a local directory to the code package.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AddDirectoryOption 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [localDir](./faastjs.adddirectoryoption.localdir.md) | <code>string</code> | The local directory to recursively add to the code package. |
|  [remoteDir](./faastjs.adddirectoryoption.remotedir.md) | <code>string</code> | The location where the local directory will be copied to on the remote side. |
